Abstract: Balraj Malhotra, 71, recalls how he experienced throes of India's independence and partition, while Rasika Aggarwal, a 21-year-old teacher, describes her hope for the future; photos; chronology of India's history in 20th century (M)

LeadParagraph: For India, the last century was bisected into a before and after on Aug. 15, 1947, the day the British Indian empire gained its independence and was divided into Islamic Pakistan and overwhelmingly Hindu but secular India.
